title: Bug 120315: Display property of item not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is not having any effect in the new PDF emitter.
OB: Currently, when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item is still being displayed in the new PDF emitter.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the display property of an item is set to 'none', the item should be hidden or not displayed in the new PDF emitter.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a PDF.
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label.
3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property of the label to 'none'.
4. Generate a new PDF using the emitter.

Expected result: The label should not be displayed in the generated PDF.
